notes: Modern duplex/loft-style apartment with stylish living room featuring crystal chandelier, stone accent walls, and recessed lighting. Major baby safety concern: internal stairs leading to upper loft area with wooden railing that has wide gaps between slats - would require childproofing. The loft has low ceiling height and open railings. Kitchen area appears modern with new refrigerator and access to a small balcony with washing machine. Clean condition overall but limited natural light visible.
